node_id.description: The node ID of the test case.

node_type.description: The node type. Always set to 'case'.

path.description: The file path where the test case is defined.

module.description: The module name where the test case is defined (optional).

suite.description: The test suite name where the test case is defined (optional).

markers.description: The test markers. Each marker is a string.

parameters.description: Test parameters names and types. Each key is a parameter name and each value is a parameter type as a string.
